name: Special K
description: Special K is a hybrid cross between sativa Western Winds and indica Slyder. The plant is tall with substantial girth, despite its lanky indica influence, with elongated buds. The effects are long-lasting with a quick onset, beginning with a physical buzz and evolving into a heady lift that borders on psychedelic. Special K has been called adventureful, making it a wonderful daytime strain. Indoor or outdoor grows can expect to flower at around 10 weeks.
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Euphoric, Relaxed, Creative, Depression, Stress, Fatigue, Headaches, Insomnia, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth
